I have been using Ubuntu since 7.10, have
tried many different flavors of Linux, but
always come back to Ubuntu. I am a member of the beginners
team, on the Ubuntu Forums.  My name
is Brandon Plaufcan, I am from New Castle, Pennsylvania,
and I am 25 years old.

=== Accomplishments ===

I am helping the Ubuntu Documentation team, with the clean up and reorganization of the Ubuntu Wiki Help pages.  Found here: <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Beginners/Development]]</nowiki>.
